LanguageData.AM_FriendlyDuel_Lose.stages.0.descriptio: I lost in a friendly duel against {OTHERPAWN}.\nLosing is disappointing but it was still good practice. I'll get em' next time!
LanguageData.AM_FriendlyDuel_Lose.stages.0.label: lost friendly duel
LanguageData.AM_FriendlyDuel_Win.stages.0.description: I won a friendly duel against {OTHERPAWN}!\nIt was a relaxed bout but it still feels good to be victorious.
LanguageData.AM_FriendlyDuel_Win.stages.0.label: won friendly duel
